message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget, the value of this product is quite high. Could you consider $15,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle again?
